params.optionId: token ID of option to exercise

params.amount: Amount of STONE to receive after expiration
params.to: address to receive STONE option NFT

mergeOption(address,uint256,uint256).details: if the expirationTime of `from` option is longer than `to` Option, it should be reverted

params.fromOptionId: token ID of option to burn
params.to: account to receive new STONE Option
params.toOptionId: token ID of option to be merged

multicall(bytes[]).details: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amount: The amount of stones to be given to the new STONE option
params.to: account to receive new STONE Option

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

grantOption(address,uint256,uint256).notice: grant STONE option. It can be received after the expiration time. (technically it means `mint OPTION NFT`)

mergeOption(address,uint256,uint256).notice: merge the quantities of the two STONE option and burn `from` STONE option

splitOption(address,uint256,uint256).notice: create new STONE option by splitting from the existing STONE option
